original_title: We Are the Absolute Worst: Our Divorce Fayre
overview: Jamilah & George have seen the best part of their marital existence and would love to put an end to it. While Dr. Velma looks for common ground to reignite their once powerful love, it only takes a little nudge to unravel schemes beyond the eye.
title: We Are the Absolute Worst: Our Divorce Fayre
